title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry the pancetta with garlic in a pan until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Add the egg and cheese mixture, stirring quickly.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry onion in a pan until golden brown.
Add canned tomatoes and cream, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for another 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice.
